com.facebook.buck.distributed.build_slave

Class ThriftCoordinatorClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.distributed.build_slave.ThriftCoordinatorClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @ThreadSafe
public class ThriftCoordinatorClient
extends Object
implements Closeable
    This class is ThreadSafe. No more than one RPC request is allowed at a time.
